title: Apple Announces New Apple TV 4K with A12 Bionic Chip and Upgraded Siri Remote
content:
Apple today announced a new version of the Apple TV 4K, called simply the New ‌Apple TV‌ 4K, with the A12 Bionic chip and an all-new Siri Remote.


The new ‌Apple TV‌ 4K will cost $179 for 32GB and $199 for 64GB, and orders open on April 30.

This story is part of our coverage of Apple's ongoing "Spring Loaded" event today. Refresh for more details and follow along with our live blog for the latest updates. We're also live tweeting the event on Twitter.
